description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Astralis is a military science fiction shooter.  Combat - purge swarms of alien terrors.  Exploration - cross a vast landscape, filled with discovery.  Judgment - who will you punish?  Who will you forgive?
description.short: Astralis is a military science fiction shooter.  Combat - purge swarms of alien terrors.  Exploration - cross a vast landscape, filled with discovery.  Judgment - who will you punish?  Who will you forgive?
